scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a banquet or feast taking place within a hall. On the left, several men are seated at a long table covered with a white cloth, some with food and vessels before them. The background wall is adorned with a gold, patterned tapestry. To the right, a group of individuals, including young men and women, are entering the space, some carrying platters. The architecture suggests an interior space with a window offering a glimpse of an outdoor landscape. The overall impression is one of a formal gathering or meal.
